```{python}
import urllib
import json
from IPython.display import SVG, Image
```

```{python}
url = "https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/meteofrance?latitude=43.6109&longitude=3.8763&daily=temperature_2m_max,temperature_2m_min,precipitation_probability_max&timezone=Europe%2FLondon"
from urllib.request import urlopen
with urlopen(url) as response:
    data = response.read()
```

```{python}
dat=json.loads(data.decode())
```

```{python}
display(SVG(filename="svg/icon.svg"))
d = [[dat['daily']['time'][0],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_max'][0],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_min'][0]],
[dat['daily']['time'][1],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_max'][1],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_min'][1]], 
[dat['daily']['time'][2],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_max'][2],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_min'][2]],
[dat['daily']['time'][3],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_max'][3],dat['daily']['temperature_2m_min'][3]]]
     
print ("{:<32} {:<16} {:<16}".format('day', 'tmax', 'tmin'))

for v in d:
    day,tmax,tmin = v
    print ("{:<32} {:<16} {:<15}".format(day,tmax,tmin))
```
